content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
you wanna find a good place to make some brisket or top steaks. WHW was the best Korean bbq restaurant I've ever been to. The staff was amazing, the food was amazing and customers around you are always having a great time. The music is also another great thing about it too. I recommend bring your friend and family over there to get the best experienc. I've been to other Korean bbq's, but WHW felt like I was trying Korean bbq for the first time.
